text: Julieta Serrano Romero (born 2 January 1933) is a Spanish actress. In September 2018 she was awarded by the Premio Nacional de Teatro. Her best known roles were in Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown (1988), Dark Habits (1983) and Teatro de siempre (1966).
